{{/* Purpose: To generate breadcrumb navigation for documentation pages. The script processes the current page's URL to extract package names and section identifiers, mapping them to human-readable names. It constructs a hierarchical breadcrumb trail, indicating the current page's position within the site's documentation structure. Inputs: - Current Page's URL: Used to derive documentation hierarchy. - $concept: The root node to the breadcrumb, defaults to "Packages" if the API does exist in the left nav/packages.yaml. - $leafNodeWithCapitalization: The specific API item to the breadcrumb with capitilization. - $.Site.Data.displayNameToPackageName: [Unscoped package name] -> [Scoped package name] mapping. Output: - HTML paragraph (

) with breadcrumb links. */}} {{ $concept := "Packages" }} {{ $leafSegment := "" }} {{ $leafNodeWithCapitalization := "" }} {{ $categoryCapitalized := "" }} {{ $leafNodeFound := false }} {{/* This splits the URL into segments for breadcrumb generation. If url parameters are added/modified, breadcrumb may not behave correctly. */}} {{ $fullURL := trim .Page.RelPermalink "/" }} {{ $urlSegments := split $fullURL "/" }} {{ $packageName := index $urlSegments 2 }} {{ if $packageName }} {{ $packageDisplayName := index $.Site.Data.displayNameToPackageName $packageName }} {{ range $key, $value := $.Site.Data.packages }} {{ if in $value $packageDisplayName }} {{ $concept = $key }} {{ break }} {{ end }} {{ end }} {{ if gt (len $urlSegments) 3 }} {{ $leafSegment = index $urlSegments 3 }} {{ $leafNodeFound = true }} {{ $leafParts := split $leafSegment "-" }} {{ if eq (len $leafParts) 2 }} {{ $leafNodeLower := index $leafParts 0 }} {{ $categoryLower := index $leafParts 1 }} {{ $categoryCapitalized = (title (humanize $categoryLower)) }} {{ $allLeafNodes := index $.Site.Data.allAPIs $packageName }} {{ $leafNodesInCategory := index $allLeafNodes $categoryCapitalized }} {{ range $leafNodesInCategory }} {{ if eq (lower .) $leafNodeLower }} {{ $leafNodeWithCapitalization = . }} {{ break }} {{ end }} {{ end }} {{ end }} {{ end }}

{{ humanize $concept | title }} {{ if $packageName }} {{ $packageLink := print "/docs/apis/" $packageName "/" }} > {{ $packageDisplayName }} {{ end }} {{ if $leafNodeFound }} {{ $itemLink := print "/docs/apis/" $packageName "/" $leafSegment }} > {{ $leafNodeWithCapitalization }} {{ end }}

{{ end }}
